question: You have a complaint about the hotel you stayed at while attending a meeting that was booked by the organiser of a company meeting. Write a letter to the organiser of the meeting and includeDetails about the meetingThe problem you faceWhat should be done
text: I am writing this letter to inform you of the internet connectivity issue that happened while attending a corporate meeting that was organized by your side.
The meeting took place last Wednesday, in the main conference room, and it started at 10 am. There were twenty-seven attendees and two security officers by the entrance doors.

As soon as we started with our presentation, internet speed decreased, and the connection disappeared very quickly after a couple of minutes. The hotel staff tried to assist us by resetting the internet router, but with no luck. Fortunately, we were able to reconnect eventually after 15 minutes of trying. This did not look very professional while trying to have a corporate meeting.

We understand this may be a misfortunate situation, but we also sincerely hope that this won't happen again if we decide to use your services in the future. Internet speed and reliability is of  essential importance to us.
